unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak ₹5500 aaila! Fattim mhoineak fokot Rs. 3200 aslem, kya ho raha hai?
normalised: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak rupiya paanch hazar paanchshe aslem! Fattlea mhoineak fokot rupiya teen hazar don'she aslem, kyaa zataai?
text: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak ₹5500 aaila! Fattim mhoineak fokot Rs. 3200 aslem, kya ho raha hai?
